post.body: I can't even imagine what does your laptop go through on a daily basis :P
thank you :)
random shots at random times, that's why I'm not looking at the camera :)
it didn't occur to me, I had to navigate between 2 trash containers and park half on the sand and half on the pavement :P
nice to see you on Twitter, have fun :)
good morning to you and wish you an awesome day
it went great, thanks for the positive thoughts and have a great day :)
agreed, but this time I had to park in an absurd manner even in Dubai standards, thankfully meeting was short :)
good night and sweet dreams L)
squeezing my brain to come up with a different kind of social media campaign for an imminent launch
following @AJGaza, things are really awful there...
a new profile photo of another Random look :P
back to the office, tons of work to do, starting with a proposal...
I seem to be the first visitor in their new offices in the new building... everything is hectic and they're still unpacking
Good morning everyone, parked in an absurd manner, heading to my first meeting...
too tired to do anything else, off to read for a short while before bed...
done with the spreadsheets, sending a Social media questionnaire to a major electronic manufacturer
meaningful work is one that is autonomous, complex, engages the mind and offers a relationship between effort and reward
back home, doing some more work...
back to the office after a long meeting, mentally exhausted...
